title: Trump says US to get 30 million to 50 million barrels of oil from Venezuela at market price
description: Trump pledged to use proceeds from the sale of this oil "to benefit the people" of both countries.
content: Trump pledged to use proceeds from the sale of this oil "to benefit the people" of both countries.
